General.Name: Shoper S.A.
General.Description: Shoper SA provides Software as a Service solutions for e-commerce in Poland. The company offers subscription-based services. It also provides Shoper payment, campaigns, and apps. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Kraków, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Krzysztof P. Krawczyk
1.Title: Co-Founder, COO & Member of Management Board
